activationConfig.title: Plex-Earth Pro (RC)
activationConfig.trialText: Run Plex-Earth Pro (Release Candidate) for 30 days—no credit card needed.
activationConfig.activateCodeText: Unlock advanced tools and access premium data to enhance your design experience.
activationConfig.messageActivationRequiredText: To get started with Plex-Earth Pro, you need to activate it on this computer. You can either start a 7-day free trial or activate your subscription.<LineBreak/><LineBreak/>Please proceed with activation now.
activationConfig.messageTrialSuccessfullyStartedText: Your free trial has been activated successfully!<LineBreak/><LineBreak/>Explore all the features of Plex-Earth Pro and experience the power of premium tools and data for your designs.
activationConfig.messageCodeSuccessfullyActivatedText: Your subscription has been activated successfully!<LineBreak/><LineBreak/>You now have access to all the features of Plex-Earth Pro. Enjoy designing with premium tools and data.
activationConfig.messageUnhandledErrorText: Please contact our Support Team at <Hyperlink NavigateUri='[$EMAIL_SUPPORT]'>support@plexscape.com</Hyperlink>

onSubcriptionExpiredMessage.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Your Subscription Has Expired – Renew Now!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Keep up with your competitive advantage!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Run>Need assistance or more information?  </Run><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_PAGE_CONTACT_SUPPORT]'>Contact Support</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>

btnAction.text: I already have an Activation Code

onTrialSuccessMessage_Pro.content: Your Plex-Earth Pro free trial has just begun!
onTrialSuccessMessage_Pro.title: Welcome to Plex-Earth Pro!

onTrialExpiredMessage_Pro.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Your Free Trial Has Ended – What’s Next?</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'><LineBreak/>You have two options:<LineBreak/>1) <Bold>Upgrade to one of our service plans</Bold><LineBreak/>   For full access to all features.<LineBreak/>2) <Bold>Continue with Plex-Earth Lite</Bold><LineBreak/>   Our free edition, to keep using basic features.<LineBreak/></TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Run>Need assistance or more information?  </Run><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_PAGE_CONTACT_SUPPORT]'>Contact Support</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>

btnAction.text: I already have an Activation Code

onTrialExpiredMessage_Pro.title: Your Free Trial Has Ended – Keep Designing with Plex-Earth!
